name: Double Time Dash
description:
A game by Francis Vace
In collaboration with Faulty
For his song Double Time Dash
Available now on Ponies At Dawn: Eternal

Watch the song in full on youtube: https://youtu.be/MQ4g5M3pikY
Download the album: https://poniesatdawn.bandcamp.com/album/eternal

How to play:
Jump: W or UP
Up:   W or UP
Down: S or DOWN
